item.description: Guided Exercise: Installing Istio on a minikube cluster In this exercise, you will deploy the MetalLB add-on on a minikube cluster. Outcomes You should be able to: Install Istio on the minikube cluster. Get the Istio ingress service endpoint. Deploy the Istio add-ons. Create an example application to test the Istio installation.
